OCD.name: Horizontal Bar Graph
OCD.description: Takes tabular data and generates PostScript for a horizontal bar graph.

AD.name: Label
AD.description: The field used to label the bar lines

AD.name: Start Date
AD.description: The field used for the starting date

AD.name: End Date
AD.description: The field used for the ending date

AD.name: Size Bars By
AD.description: The field used to size the horizontal bar lines by

AD.name: Minimum Amount Per Day For Bar Scaling
AD.description: Bars that have have an amount per day of at least this amount will be scaled. Bars that have an amount per day less than this amount will be displayed differently.

AD.name: Date Format
AD.description: The format of the start and end dates

AD.name: Year Label Font Size
AD.description: The font size to use for year labels. NOTE: If this is too big, year labels may overlap.

AD.name: Bar Label Font Size
AD.description: The font size to use for bar labels. NOTE: Extremely large values here may result in poor results.

AD.name: Colorized by
AD.description: The field used to color the bar lines

AD.name: Scale to Fit an 8.5x11 page?
AD.description: When this is checked, the resulting visualization will be scaled to fit a page.
